title: Greg Allen
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body"><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DMRGxUrpgOc?rel=0&controls=0" width="853"></iframe>  
Greg Allen, founder of Chicago’s Neo-Futurists theater company, and Art Institute curator Sarah Kelly Oehler review the fractured, random, and brief nature of modern art and Neo-Futurism.</section><section id="figures"> Click here to watch the video. </section>
